introduction: 英国万象国际电影节竞赛单元内容简介：青年黄鹏程一直的梦想是去北京看迷笛音乐节，可远在云南的他没有钱。而他终于决定用搭车的方式去参加迷笛音乐节，他的路途中会发生什么？3177公里，21天，11个城市，32辆顺风车，带着对迷笛的激情从云南到北京，青年黄鹏程的成人礼！Brief introducti on to the content: the yound man Huang Pengcheng always dreams to attend Midi music festival in Beijing, but he is in Yunnan far away from Beijing with no money. Finally he decides to attend the Midi music festival by taking a ride. What will happen on the road?3177 kilometers, 21 days, 11 cities, 32 free rides, the young man Huang Pengcheng travels from Yunnan to Beijing for his adult ceremony with the passions for Midi.
